00019 #include <cstdlib>
00020 #include <cmath>

00022 #include <qapplication.h>
00023 #include <qstring.h>
00024 #include <qfont.h>

00026 #include "main.h"
00027 #include "globalTabs.h"

00031 #include "journalData.h"

00033 
00034 QString formatCurrency(Q_INT64 amount, bool commas)
00035 {
00036     QString formatted = QString::number(std::abs(amount));
00037     if(formatted.length() == 1)
00038         formatted = "0.0" + formatted;
00039     else if(formatted.length() == 2)
00040         formatted = "0." + formatted;
00041     else
00042         formatted.insert(formatted.length() - 2, '.');
00043 
00044     if(commas)
00045     {
00046         std::div_t divResult = std::div(formatted.length() - 3, 3);
00047         int start = divResult.rem;
00048         int times = divResult.quot;
00049 
00050         for(int i = 0; i < times; i++)
00051         {
00052             if(start == 0)
00053                 continue;
00054 
00055             formatted.insert(start + i, ',');
00056 
00057             start += 3;
00058         }
00059     }
00060 
00061     if(amount < 0)
00062         formatted = "(" + formatted + ")";
00063 
00064     return formatted;
00065 }
00066 
00067 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00068 {
00069     QApplication app(argc,argv);
00070 
00071     app.setFont(QFont("Verdana", 9));
00072     
00073     Settings *settings = Settings::instance();
00074     Client *client = Client::instance();
00075     AccountsData *accountsData = AccountsData::instance();
00076     JournalData *journalData = JournalData::instance();
00077     ReportsEditor *reportsEditor = ReportsEditor::instance();
00078 
00079     client->initiate();
00080     accountsData->initiate();
00081     journalData->initiate();
00082     reportsEditor->initiate();
00083 
00084     GlobalTabs globalTabs("globalTabs");
00085     globalTabs.show();
00086     app.setMainWidget(&globalTabs);
00087     int retVal = app.exec();
00088 
00089     accountsData->destroy();
00090     journalData->destroy();
00091     reportsEditor->destroy();
00092     
00093     client->destroy();
00094     settings->destroy();
00095 
00096     return retVal;
00097 }
